articles.author: Khanyiso Tshwaku
articles.title: 'A lot of cricket to be played,' warns Markram as Pakistan, NZ throw cat among WTC pigeons
articles.description: The Proteas' stand-in Test captain, Aiden Markram, is kept grounded by the fact they still have their World Test Championship final fate in their own hands ahead of Tuesday's second Test against Bangladesh in Chattogram.
articles.content: The Proteas' stand-in Test captain, Aiden Markram, is kept grounded by the fact they still have their World Test Championship final fate in their own hands ahead of Tuesday's second Test against Bang… [+20 chars]

articles.title: England in Pakistan: Andy Zaltzman on the statistics behind hosts' remarkable comeback series win
articles.description: Comedian and BBC cricket statistician Andy Zaltzman looks at the statistics behind Pakistan's remarkable comeback against England to win the Test series.
articles.content:
Never before had a pair of bowlers taken 39 wickets in a two-Test sequence, as the series-discombobulating pair of Noman Ali and Sajid Khan achieved this month.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
